review: Dr. Pankaj Aneja carefully examined my blood reports and accordingly adviced me the treatment plan. He also gave me diabetes helpline number which guided me regarding diet plan. His treatment strategy helped me control my blood sugar levels from the very first day. ** ** *** **** ************* ** *** *******
Soft spoken, very intelligent, thorough and holistic approach.strongly recommended.*** ********* ** ****** *********

***** ****** **** ** ** ****.  I had visited this doctor thrice but 0% relief in condition. Every time doctor has changed the medicines without any explanation. At last he suggested to admission in Max hospital. I have paid 4500 consultancy charges plus 3000 for medicine but no improvement in condition. ****** ****** *** ** *** ********** ** ******* **** **** ***** *** ***********

The staff dodge patients about charges for different tests. Never explain charges. We paid charges for all tests. We were told for blood tests but were NOT ( repeat NOT) told to pay separately.The staff who came for blood sample asked again to pay. we were shocked. We were told to pay Rs. 3500 separately. We had already paid Rs. 3400. The attitude of staff to keep patient in darkness.

Pankaj Aneja is a good diebetologist.
My fasting sugar was 200 plus and pp was 285. I was horrified.
I consulted Dr.Aneja. within a week, my sugar was in range. Spectacular result!
Recommend him for diebetic patients.
V.S.Singh, sector 15, ****** **********

Dr.Aneja has a very professional approach & goes an extra mile to help out to the patients in any way he can. He ensures whether it's his clinic or Max Hospital the patient should get utmost care & *** **** **** is he looks into each & every details himself.  In short I highly recommend him.
